Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: feverthebeaver
Reviews.Content: TV has horrible lines through the TV on the bottom and right hand side. Don't recommend this TV. Only had it for 2 months.

Reviews.Title: coby tv
Reviews.Author: lilhenry74
Reviews.Content: This coby tv has been great there has been no problems picture and sound are good. I couldn't hookup my home theater but the tv is great none the less

Reviews.Title: This TV will die, and when it does, you're on your own
Reviews.Author: Roger Butler
Reviews.Content: Be forewarned - This TV will not last for the duration of the one year warranty.  When it dies, you might think "Coby will send a repair person to my home to fix it because that's what the warranty says," but you would quickly find out just how wrong you are.  Coby does not provide in-home service, and any claims they make regarding shipping your defective TV to them for repair are nothing more than an exercise in frustration.  It appears this company is circling the drain and may be out of business any time soon, so don't buy any Coby product unless you're prepared to deal with any problems entirely on your own.
